body.name: Portable Neck Fan - 3 Speed Rechargeable Bladeless Neck Fan, Adjustable Personal Neck Fan For Women & Men Modern Design, Great Cooling Fan For Travel, Outdoors & Sports
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 5 hrs 40 mins
features: WEARABLE FAN TO COOL ANYWHERE. This Neck Fan will give you the ultimate cooling experience anywhere and anytime, this fan is smooth and quiet operating, made of quality and comfortable material, which gives you a modern leafless neck fan. This has 48 double turbo air outlets with 3-speed airflow options.

RELIABLE WITH LONG-LASTING USE. Have a satisfying 2.5 to 6 long hours of usage depending on speed and conveniently recharge for everlasting reuse through your power bank, laptop, or directly to an outlet using the included USB cable.

COMFORTABLE HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL - Sweating will not be a problem even for an all-day-user. Having the finest and soft silica gel with a special heat insulation function, with an adjustable gooseneck which is safe and protective from twisting in your hair, this will give you a total cooling experience.

HANDS-FREE AND LIGHTWEIGHT - Be on the go and do your daily indoor and outdoor activities, without compromising on comfort and style by wearing this handsfree and lightweight cooling neck fan. When not in use, put it into the included convenient special Hand Bag

YOUR PERSONAL FASHION FAN. The trendy look of this modern bladeless fan will keep you in style at work, home, outdoors, and Travel. Make this your everyday pocket-size must-haves now! This is the best Gift idea for your Wife, Husband, Kid or any loved one, they will love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wife loves it
reviews.reviewText: Wife wanted this for her random hot flashes, she said this works great. She also said she is going to take with her on the trip in case she gets hot in the air plane..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift for my daugter
reviews.reviewText: "I decided to surprise my hardworking daughter with the V=NEXAIR Portable Neck Fan, knowing that she often feels hot while working tirelessly on cleaning tasks. The result? She absolutely loves it! The portable neck fan has become her go-to companion, providing a refreshing breeze whenever she needs it.The convenience of hands-free operation is a game-changer, allowing her to continue with her tasks without any hindrance. The fan's portability and compact design make it easy to carry around. It seems to have made a positive impact on her comfort level during those hot and demanding cleaning sessions.If you know someone who works hard and could use a cooling companion, the V=NEXAIR Portable Neck Fan is a thoughtful and practical gift. My daughter's positive feedback confirms its effectiveness, making it a win-win choice!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Effectively and quickly cools me down from hot flashes! It is not too loud so that I cannot hear around me. Rechargable. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and powerful
reviews.reviewText: the neck fan is very nice. i got it for my mom who’s nonstop working. she loves it due to some areas she works in barely having working ac. so this was a good gift for her. i’d recommend this for someone who’s constantly out in the heat or just doing house chores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neat, Especially for the Price
reviews.reviewText: For the price, it's good. I overheat easy so it's nice to have 3 adjustable breezes on your neck. People are babies and complain about the noise but I don't think it's really that bad for the price. I think it's honestly how engines work... and it's quiet enough... you pay $50 or $8 for the same sound and quality if you want. But don't get fooled. This one is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Never held a charge
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to receive the fan but after using it one time, the fan’s charge would only last a couple minutes. The charging cord that I received with this product then stopped fitting securely in the charging port making it impossible to recharge. I would not recommend this product as it does not perform as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The battery died after a few uses. It was loud.
reviews.reviewText: I get very warm in church and restaurants. Especially in the summer. It was fun. I need to put new batteries in it already though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my sweaty fiancé
reviews.reviewText: My fiancé is a sweaty Betty. He knows that I know it we all know. There’s no sake, and pretending like it’s not a fact. This neck fan is a lifesaver for summertime walks., the beach, I’m really anything else done in the. It allows him to stay comfortable much longer than he ever has before while outside in the summer heat. I don’t know how we survive without it before.
